name: Classic White T-Shirt

description: Slim-fit blue denim jeans with a modern cut. Durable and stylish for everyday wear.

description: Cozy red hoodie with a front pocket and adjustable drawstrings. Perfect for chilly days.

name: Black Leather Jacket
description: Classic black leather jacket with zip closure. Adds edge to any outfit.

description: Lightweight floral dress with a flattering fit. Ideal for warm weather.

description: Soft grey sweatpants with elastic waistband. Great for lounging or workouts.

description: Casual striped polo shirt with a classic collar. Breathable and stylish.

name: Navy Blue Blazer
description: Tailored navy blue blazer for formal or smart-casual occasions.

description: Comfortable green cargo shorts with multiple pockets. Perfect for summer adventures.

name: Yellow Raincoat
description: Bright yellow raincoat with hood and waterproof material. Stay dry in style.
